thread.title: InventHelp Inventor Designs Reliable Ear Protection For Use in Showers, Bathtubs and Swimming Pools (CBA-2746)
thread.title_full: InventHelp Inventor Designs Reliable Ear Protection For Use in Showers, Bathtubs and Swimming Pools (CBA-2746) - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: InventHelp Inventor Designs Reliable Ear Protection For Use in Showers, Bathtubs and Swimming Pools (CBA-2746)
text:
A leading invention submission company, InventHelp is submitting the EAR GLOVE to interested companies for their consideration.
PITTSBURGH, PA (PRWEB) October 19, 2015
A lot of people have water-in-ear issues, so an inventor from Columbia, S.C., has decided that there needs to be a way for these people to be in water without the worry of discomfort and/or infection.
The EAR GLOVE provides protection for a userâ€™s ear while showering, bathing or swimming. This not only prevents discomfort and/or infection, but it allows for enjoyment and peace of mind. Easy to use and compact, it's ideal for people with water-in-ear issues. It also is useful for pediatricians and other medical professionals.
The original design was submitted to the Columbia office of InventHelp. It is currently available for licensing or sale to manufacturers or marketers. For more information, write Dept. 14-CBA-2746, InventHelp, 217 Ninth Street, Pittsburgh, PA 15222, or call (412) 288-1300 ext. 1368. Learn more about InventHelp's Invention Submission Services at http://www.InventHelp.com - https://www.youtube.com/user/inventhelp
